description: Determine the number of immigrants from Poland.
Which country has the highest number of immigrants?
Identify any country with a significantly lower number of immigrants compared to others.

Compute the total number of immigrants from the top three countries.
Is there any noticeable clustering of countries with similar numbers of immigrants?

Identify if there is a correlation between the country and the number of immigrants.
